text: You made some sort of a protest to Graybury. I'll give you credit for that. But you didn't press the matter because, very naturally, you were thoroughly enjoying Forrest's company in idyllic surroundings.""How dare you say such a thing?" she blazed. "For goodness' sake show a glimmer of reason, was his equally indignant rejoinder.
